comment.author: 9406236@N02
comment._content:
I own two of the original US reconnaissance photographs of this Island.  The only identification on them is Philippines.  On one of them destroyed aircraft can be seen in the lower right corner. Is there any ID with your photograph that gives a location?

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/johntewell/4119223732]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/johntewell/3232829733]
